definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: His clothes were crawling with lice.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服上爬满了虱子。

sentences.english: After you wiped out the lice from of your husband's and sons' shirts.
sentences.chinese: 在你把夫儿们的衬衣上的虱子一颗颗的掐死之后。

sentences.english: They were commingling lice and blood．
sentences.chinese: 他们浑身是血混合着虱子。

sentences.english: The new approach rests on reconstructing the family tree of lice.
sentences.chinese: 这种新的方法要借助对虱子系统树的重建。

sentences.english: The two monkeys sat delousing each other.
sentences.chinese: 两只猴子坐在一起互相捉“虱子”。

sentences.english: So lice have been with us since the world's first clothes were made.
sentences.chinese: 在世界第一件衣服出现后虱子也就和我们形影不离了。

sentences.english: Thereupon, he took an arrow and shot at the louse.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他拿起一支箭，向虱子射去。

sentences.english: Species of human lice thus mirror the splits in the tree of ape and human evolution.
sentences.chinese: 人体上的虱子物种反映了猿和人类进化历程的分节点。

sentences.english: Sea lice travel from inland rivers to the ocean. The lice eat the muscle and skin of young fish.
sentences.chinese: 海虱子通过内陆河流传播到大洋中。

sentences.english: Then grab the tick as close to the dog's skin as you can and pull it straight out.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能地靠近狗狗的皮肤抓取虱子，然后直接扯出来。

sentences.english: Before you pull a tick off Fido, dab the critter with rubbing alcohol to make it loosen its grip.
sentences.chinese: 在你抓虱子之前，用酒精轻轻拍一下它，让其松手。

sentences.english: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.
sentences.chinese: 他说一声，苍蝇就成群而来，并有虱子进入他们四境。
必须除掉家畜身上的虱子。

sentences.english: If their host evolves into two species, the lice will do likewise.
sentences.chinese: 如果居主进化为两个不同的种类，虱子也会如此进化。

sentences.english: But North Korea is already subject to stiff sanctions.
sentences.chinese: 但朝鲜已经受到了严厉制裁，可谓虱子多了不嫌痒。

sentences.english: Then the little louse fell in and burnt herself.
sentences.chinese: 小虱子跌进蛋壳，烧伤了自己。

definition: moss/lichen/moss on damp walls/used erroneously for 蘇|苏
